posts.title: Two Sum
posts.text: Q. Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. Example:1234Given nums = [2, 7, 11, 15], target = 9,Because nums[0] + nums[1] = 2 + 7 = 9,return [0, 1]. 12345678/** * @param {number[]} nums * @param {number} target * @return {number[]} */export function twoSum(nums, target) {}
